intro:
Our goal is to provide you with clear, trusted information so that you can make informed decisions and help stop the pandemic.Data is just one piece of the equation. 

Here you will find essential information that will help you understand, interpret, and apply the data on our site, including: answers to frequently asked questions and a glossary of critical COVID-related terms.
metadataTitle: COVID-19 Essential Information & Resources - Covid Act Now
metadataDescription: Find recent and trusted information & resources about the novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV). Learn about Symptoms, Tests, Risks, and more. Backed by medical experts. Make informed decisions to stop the disease for you and your community.

sections.description: R0 vs R(t) vs Infection rate: We have compiled a simple glossary of essential COVID-related terms, which we will continue to update and expand.
